作詞：[[懐古P]]
作曲：[[懐古P]]
編曲：[[懐古P]]
唄：初音ミク
コーラス：猫村いろは

**曲紹介
-懐古Pによる長編人形劇「瘴気城の歌姫機械　第一話『晦冥音叉』」劇中歌。
-制作に半年を費やしたという、作者お手製の人形劇は必見。

**歌詞
（動画より書き起こし）

Waiting for the house physician,
Son of the gold-beater
One thousand gold-eaters
crawl on his hoot.

An arrested young landlady was
only 13 years old.
Can you hear it screaming
through the air there?

Way to the rainbow,
five million.
the Curly bomb is in your head.

Fighting for the rhetorician,
she is exhausted now.
mesmeric roasted pork
flaverful dish.

Meaningful vermillion
chosen from ten billion
colors is noto medicine breathable air

Way to the rainbow,Mercurian.
the craggyrock is in your hand.
